name: smdm-slide-menu
author: Jakob Osterberger <jo@studiomitte.com>
description: A library agnostic multilevel page menu with a smooth slide effect based on CSS transitions, focused on accessibility.

scripts.test: cypress run || echo 'cypress run' | ddev ssh -s cypress
scripts.pre-version: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run format && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.publish-version: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.version-patch: npm run pre-version && npm version patch --force -m "[RELEASE] patch version %s"
scripts.version-minor: npm run pre-version && npm version minor --force -m "[RELEASE] minor version %s"
scripts.version-major: npm run pre-version && npm version major --force -m "[RELEASE] major version %s"
